options.name: Bot Token
options.description: Manage messages, channels, and members on a server

options.name: OAuth2
options.description: Same features as 'Bot Token' with easier Bot installation

options.name: Webhook
options.description: Send messages to a specific channel

options.name: Delete
options.description: Delete a message in a channel

options.name: Get
options.description: Get a message in a channel

options.name: Get Many
options.description: Retrieve the latest messages in a channel

options.name: React with Emoji
options.description: React to a message with an emoji
options.action: React with an emoji to a message

options.name: Send
options.description: Send a message to a channel, thread, or member

options.name: Send and Wait for Response
options.description: Send a message and wait for response
options.action: Send message and wait for response

properties.name: guildId
properties.description: Select the server (guild) that your bot is connected to

properties.name: channelId
properties.description: Select the channel by name, URL, or ID

properties.name: returnAll
properties.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

properties.name: limit
properties.description: Max number of results to return

options.name: simplify
options.description: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data

properties.name: channelId
properties.description: Select the channel by name, URL, or ID

properties.name: messageId
properties.description: The ID of the message

properties.name: emoji
properties.description: The emoji you want to react with

properties.name: sendTo
properties.description: Send message to a channel or DM to a user

properties.name: userId
properties.description: Select the user you want to assign a role to

properties.name: channelId
properties.description: Select the channel by name, URL, or ID

properties.name: content
properties.description: The content of the message (up to 2000 characters)

options.name: flags
options.description: Message flags. More info.”.

options.name: message_reference
options.description: Fill this to make your message a reply. Add the message ID.

options.name: tts
options.description: Whether to have a bot reading the message directly in the channel

values.name: description
values.description: The description of embed

values.name: author
values.description: The name of the author

values.name: color
values.description: Color code of the embed

values.name: timestamp
values.description: The time displayed at the bottom of the embed. Provide in ISO8601 format.

values.name: title
values.description: The title of embed

values.name: url
values.description: The URL where you want to link the embed to

values.name: image
values.description: Source URL of image (only supports http(s) and attachments)

values.name: thumbnail
values.description: Source URL of thumbnail (only supports http(s) and attachments)

values.name: video
values.description: Source URL of video

values.name: inputFieldName
values.description: The contents of the file being sent with the message
values.hint: The name of the input field containing the binary file data to be sent

options.name: Approval
options.description: User can approve/disapprove from within the message

options.name: Free Text
options.description: User can submit a response via a form

options.name: Custom Form
options.description: User can submit a response via a custom form

properties.name: jsonOutput

values.name: fieldLabel
values.description: Label that appears above the input field

values.name: fieldName
values.description: The name of the field, used in input attributes and referenced by the workflow

values.name: fieldType
values.description: The type of field to add to the form

values.name: elementName
values.description: Optional field. It can be used to include the html in the output.

values.name: placeholder
values.description: Sample text to display inside the field

values.name: fieldValue
values.description: Input value can be set here or will be passed as a query parameter via Field Name if no value is set

values.name: fieldOptions
values.description: List of options that can be selected from the dropdown

values.displayName: Multiple Choice is a legacy option, please use Checkboxes or Radio Buttons field type instead
values.name: multiselectLegacyNotice
multiselect
values.description: Whether to allow the user to select multiple options from the dropdown list

values.name: html
values.description: HTML elements to display on the form page

values.name: multipleFiles
values.description: Whether to allow the user to select multiple files from the file input or just one

values.name: acceptFileTypes
values.description: Comma-separated list of allowed file extensions
values.hint: Leave empty to allow all file types

values.displayName: The displayed date is formatted based on the locale of the user's browser
values.name: formatDate
requiredField
values.description: Whether to require the user to enter a value for this field before submitting the form

options.name: limitWaitTime
options.description: Whether the workflow will automatically resume execution after the specified limit type

values.name: limitType
values.description: Sets the condition for the execution to resume. Can be a specified date or after some time.

options.name: After Time Interval
options.description: Waits for a certain amount of time

options.name: At Specified Time
options.description: Waits until the set date and time to continue

values.name: resumeAmount
values.description: The time to wait

values.name: resumeUnit
values.description: Unit of the interval value

values.name: maxDateAndTime
values.description: Continue execution after the specified date and time

options.name: appendAttribution
options.description: Whether to include the phrase "This message was sent automatically with n8n" to the end of the message

options.name: responseFormTitle
options.description: Title of the form that the user can access to provide their response

options.name: responseFormDescription
options.description: Description of the form that the user can access to provide their response

options.name: responseFormCustomCss
options.description: Override default styling of the response form with CSS

options.name: limitWaitTime
options.description: Whether the workflow will automatically resume execution after the specified limit type

values.name: limitType
values.description: Sets the condition for the execution to resume. Can be a specified date or after some time.

options.description: Waits for a certain amount of time

options.name: Create
options.description: Create a new channel

options.name: Delete
options.description: Delete a channel

options.name: Get
options.description: Get a channel

options.name: Get Many
options.description: Retrieve the channels of a server

options.name: Update
options.description: Update a channel

properties.name: guildId
properties.description: Select the server (guild) that your bot is connected to

properties.name: name
properties.description: The name of the channel

properties.name: type
properties.description: The type of channel to create

options.name: nsfw
options.description: Whether the content of the channel might be nsfw (not safe for work)

options.name: bitrate
options.description: The bitrate (in bits) of the voice channel

options.name: categoryId
options.description: The parent category where you want the channel to appear

properties.errorMessage: Not a valid Discord Category URL
Not a valid Discord Category ID

options.name: rate_limit_per_user
options.description: Amount of seconds a user has to wait before sending another message

options.name: topic
options.description: The channel topic description (0-1024 characters)

options.name: user_limit
options.description: The limit for the number of members that can be in the channel (0 refers to no limit)

properties.description: Max number of results to return

properties.name: channelId
properties.description: Select the channel by name, URL, or ID

properties.name: name
properties.description: The new name of the channel. Fill this field only if you want to change the channel's name.

options.name: nsfw
options.description: Whether the content of the channel might be nsfw (not safe for work)

options.name: bitrate
options.description: The bitrate (in bits) of the voice channel

options.name: categoryId
options.description: The parent category where you want the channel to appear

properties.errorMessage: Not a valid Discord Category URL
Not a valid Discord Category ID

options.name: rate_limit_per_user
options.description: Amount of seconds a user has to wait before sending another message

options.name: topic
options.description: The channel topic description (0-1024 characters)

options.name: user_limit
options.description: The limit for the number of members that can be in the channel (0 refers to no limit)

options.name: Get Many
options.description: Retrieve the members of a server

options.name: Role Add
options.description: Add a role to a member
options.action: Add a role to a member

options.name: Role Remove
options.description: Remove a role from a member
options.action: Remove a role from a member

properties.description: The ID of the user after which to return the members

options.description: Override the default avatar of the webhook

options.description: Message flags. More info.”.

options.name: tts
options.description: Whether to have a bot reading the message directly in the channel

options.name: username
options.description: Override the default username of the webhook

options.name: wait
options.description: Whether wait for the message to be created before returning its response
